item.title: How to swap ICY to BTC
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before You Begin Make sure you have a Bitcoin (BTC) wallet ready to receive the BTC after the swap. If you don’t have one, you can set up a BTC wallet using services like Electrum, Trust Wallet, UniSat or any other trusted BTC wallet provider.
